scenario.name: SIP_test
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:[$$sock.5.ipaddr]:[$$sock.5.port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [$$sock.4.ipaddr]:[$$sock.4.port];branch=[$$branch$$] From: SIP-Tester <sip:[$$users.0.username]@[$$users.0.domain]>;tag=[$$tag$$] To: SIP-Tester <sip:[$$users.0.username]@[$$users.0.domain]> Call-ID: [$$call_id$$] User-Agent: SIP-Tester CSeq: 1 REGISTER Contact: <sip:[$$users.0.username]@[$$sock.4.ipaddr]:[$$sock.4.port]>;expires=400 Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0[$$return$$][$$return$$]

REGISTER sip:[$$sock.5.ipaddr]:[$$sock.5.port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [$$sock.4.ipaddr]:[$$sock.4.port];branch=[$$branch$$] From: SIP-Tester <sip:[$$users.0.username]@[$$users.0.domain]>;tag=[$$tag$$] To: SIP-Tester <sip:[$$users.0.username]@[$$users.0.domain]> Call-ID: [$$call_id$$] User-Agent: SIP-Tester CSeq: 2 REGISTER [$authentication] Contact: <sip:[$$users.0.username]@[$$sock.4.ipaddr]:[$$sock.4.port]>;expires=400 Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0[$$return$$][$$return$$]
